technical.name: Crossing
technical.description: accuracy of crosses from wide areas.

technical.name: Dribbling
technical.description: ability to beat opponents with the ball.

technical.name: Finishing
technical.description: ability to convert chances into goals.

technical.name: Free Kick Taking
technical.description: quality of free-kick deliveries and shooting.

technical.name: Long Shots
technical.description: ability to strike accurately from distance.

technical.name: Marking
technical.description: ability to track and obstruct opponents.

technical.name: Penalty Taking
technical.description: nerve and accuracy from the penalty spot.

goalkeeping.name: Command of Area
goalkeeping.description: authority in dealing with crosses and organising defence.

goalkeeping.name: Handling
goalkeeping.description: reliability in catching or parrying shots.

goalkeeping.name: Passing
goalkeeping.description: precision when playing short balls from the back.

goalkeeping.name: Rushing Out
goalkeeping.description: willingness to leave the line to intercept through-balls.

goalkeeping.name: Tendency to Punch
goalkeeping.description: preference for punching rather than catching crosses.

mental.name: Aggression
mental.description: willingness to contest for the ball.

mental.name: Anticipation
mental.description: ability to read play and react.

mental.name: Bravery
mental.description: willingness to put one's body on the line.

mental.name: Concentration
mental.description: focus on tasks throughout a match.

mental.name: Positioning
mental.description: ability to be in the right place when defending.

mental.name: Teamwork
mental.description: willingness to follow instructions and support colleagues.

physical.name: Acceleration
physical.description: how quickly a player reaches top speed.

physical.name: Balance
physical.description: ability to stay on feet under pressure.

physical.name: Stamina
physical.description: ability to perform for the full match.

hidden.name: Adaptability
hidden.description: ease of settling in new environments.

hidden.name: Important Matches
hidden.description: ability to perform in big games.

hidden.name: Versatility
hidden.description: ability to play out of position.

playstyles.name: Power Shot
playstyles.description: Standard: power shots are struck harder and faster; PlayStyle+: shots become significantly more powerful and faster.

playstyles.name: Dead Ball
playstyles.description: Standard: set-pieces have increased speed, curve and accuracy with a longer trajectory guide; PlayStyle+: deliveries are even faster and more accurate with a maximum-length guide.

playstyles.name: Chip Shot
playstyles.description: Standard: chip shots travel faster and more accurately; PlayStyle+: chips are significantly faster and exceptionally accurate.

playstyles.name: Finesse Shot
playstyles.description: Standard: finesse shots are taken faster with additional curve and improved accuracy; PlayStyle+: shots have maximum curve and exceptional accuracy.

playstyles.name: Power Header
playstyles.description: Standard: headers possess extra power and accuracy; PlayStyle+: headed shots are executed with maximum power and accuracy.

playstyles.name: Precision Header
playstyles.description: new in EA FC 26. Standard: attacking headers are more accurate; PlayStyle+: headers deliver lethal power and pinpoint placement.

playstyles.name: Pinged Pass
playstyles.description: Standard: through passes are precise and travel quickly; PlayStyle+: passes are even more accurate with maximum curve and top speed.

playstyles.name: Incisive Pass
playstyles.description: Standard: flat through-balls are faster; PlayStyle+: the passes are executed even faster.

playstyles.name: Long Ball Pass
playstyles.description: Standard: lobbed passes travel faster and are harder to intercept; PlayStyle+: they become more accurate and even more difficult to intercept.

playstyles.name: Tiki Taka
playstyles.description: Standard: first-time ground passes are executed accurately using back-heels when appropriate; short passes are highly accurate.

playstyles.name: Whipped Pass
playstyles.description: Standard: crosses are delivered with greater pace, curve and accuracy; PlayStyle+: crosses travel even faster with maximum curve and accuracy.

playstyles.name: Inventive
playstyles.description: new in EA FC 26. Standard: players can execute trivela and no-look passes with improved accuracy; PlayStyle+: passes under pressure attain perfect accuracy.

playstyles.name: First Touch
playstyles.description: Standard: reduced error when trapping the ball with faster transition to dribbling; PlayStyle+: virtually no error and ultra-fast transition.

playstyles.name: Flair
playstyles.description: Standard: fancy passes and shots are performed with improved accuracy; PlayStyle+: they become significantly more precise.

playstyles.name: Press Proven
playstyles.description: Standard: improved close control when dribbling at jogging speed; PlayStyle+: exceptional tight control under pressure.

playstyles.name: Rapid
playstyles.description: Standard: higher dribbling speed with reduced error; PlayStyle+: even higher speed and lower error.

playstyles.name: Technical
playstyles.description: Standard: higher speed while performing controlled sprints; PlayStyle+: even greater speed and more precise turns.

playstyles.name: Trickster
playstyles.description: Standard: grants unique flick skill-moves; PlayStyle+: provides more unique flicks and extra agility.

playstyles.name: Gamechanger
playstyles.description: new in EA FC 26. Standard: combines flair and trivela finishing, enabling extraordinary shots; PlayStyle+: increases consistency on fancy shots even from difficult positions.

playstyles.name: Block
playstyles.description: Standard: increases reach when blocking shots; PlayStyle+: further enhances block reach and success.

playstyles.name: Bruiser
playstyles.description: Standard: grants greater strength in physical tackles; PlayStyle+: makes tackles significantly more forceful.

playstyles.name: Intercept
playstyles.description: Standard: expands the interception range and improves chances of retaining possession; PlayStyle+: further increases range and retention.

playstyles.name: Jockey
playstyles.description: Standard: improves speed while jockeying; PlayStyle+: speeds up transition from jockey to sprint.

playstyles.name: Slide Tackle
playstyles.description: Standard: allows stopping the ball at the tackler's feet when sliding; PlayStyle+: increases the radius of this effect.

playstyles.name: Anticipate
playstyles.description: Standard: raises likelihood of winning the ball in normal tackles and controlling it; PlayStyle+: greatly increases this chance.

playstyles.name: Acrobatic
playstyles.description: Standard: volleys are more accurate with special animations; PlayStyle+: even more accurate volleys with additional acrobatic animations.

playstyles.name: Aerial
playstyles.description: Standard: players jump higher and have improved aerial presence; PlayStyle+: even higher jump and stronger aerial duels.

playstyles.name: Aerial Fortress
playstyles.description: new in EA FC 26. Standard: significantly increases jump height and physical presence during defensive headers; PlayStyle+: almost guarantees winning aerial duels in defensive situations.

playstyles.name: Trivela
playstyles.description: Standard: contextually triggers outside-of-the-foot passes and shots; PlayStyle+: same ability with reduced error.

playstyles.name: Relentless
playstyles.description: Standard: reduces stamina loss and improves recovery at half-time; PlayStyle+: dramatically reduces fatigue and improves recovery.

playstyles.name: Quick Step
playstyles.description: Standard: faster acceleration during sprints; PlayStyle+: accelerates significantly faster.

playstyles.name: Long Throw
playstyles.description: Standard: throw-ins have more power and distance; PlayStyle+: throws are significantly more powerful with maximum range.

playstyles.name: Enforcer
playstyles.description: new in EA FC 26. Standard: enhances shoulder-to-shoulder challenges and ball shielding; PlayStyle+: allows shielding off multiple defenders at once.

playstyles.name: Far Throw
playstyles.description: Standard: goalkeepers can throw the ball further to start attacks.

playstyles.name: Footwork
playstyles.description: Standard: goalkeepers use their feet to make saves more often, aiding in close-range situations.

playstyles.name: Cross Claimer
playstyles.description: Standard: goalkeepers aggressively intercept crosses when possible.

playstyles.name: Rush Out
playstyles.description: Standard: goalkeepers leave their goal to challenge through-balls; PlayStyle+: even more aggressive and effective.

playstyles.name: Far Reach
playstyles.description: Standard: goalkeepers can reach shots further from their body; PlayStyle+: increases reach and reaction time.

playstyles.name: Quick Reflexes
playstyles.description: Standard: quicker reaction to shots; PlayStyle+: increases reaction time further.

inPossession.name: Passing Directness
inPossession.description: Options: *Much Shorter*, *Shorter*, *Balanced*, *More Direct*, *Much More Direct*. Controls pass length and speed.

inPossession.name: Tempo
inPossession.description: Options: *Lower*, *Standard*, *Higher*. Determines how quickly the team moves the ball and makes decisions.

inPossession.name: Time Wasting
inPossession.description: Options: *Less Often*, *Standard*, *More Often*. Governs deliberate time-wasting when ahead.

inPossession.name: Attacking Transition
inPossession.description: Options: *Counter-Attack*, *Standard*, *Patient Build-Up*. Sets how the team reacts immediately after winning possession.

inPossession.name: Attacking Width
inPossession.description: Options: *Much Narrower*, *Narrower*, *Standard*, *Wider*, *Much Wider*. Controls how spread out the team becomes in attack.

inPossession.name: Creative Freedom
inPossession.description: Options: *More Disciplined*, *Balanced*, *More Expressive*. Dictates the amount of risk-taking and flair allowed.

inPossession.name: Play for Set Pieces
inPossession.description: Options: *Keep Ball in Play*, *Standard*. Chooses whether to deliberately win set-pieces or maintain possession.

inPossession.name: Build-Up Strategy
inPossession.description: Options: *Play Through Press*, *Mixed*, *Direct*. Determines whether to pass through pressing opponents or bypass them.

inPossession.name: Goal Kicks
inPossession.description: Options: *Short*, *Mixed*, *Long*. Sets how the goalkeeper restarts play.

inPossession.name: GK Distribution (Speed)
inPossession.description: Options: *Slower*, *Balanced*, *Faster*. Dictates how quickly the goalkeeper releases the ball after collecting it.

inPossession.name: GK Distribution (Target)
inPossession.description: Options: *Centre-Backs*, *Full-Backs*, *Midfielders*, *Forwards*. Decides which teammates receive distribution.

inPossession.name: Pass Reception
inPossession.description: Options: *Balanced*, *Overlapped*. Controls how players position themselves to receive passes; overlapped positions into pockets.

inPossession.name: Dribbling
inPossession.description: Options: *Reduced*, *Balanced*, *Encouraged*. Regulates how often players attempt to dribble past opponents.

inPossession.name: Supporting Runs
inPossession.description: Options: *Both Flanks*, *One Flank*, *Balanced*. Specifies where supporting players make runs to aid attacks.

inPossession.name: Progress Through
inPossession.description: Options: *Left*, *Balanced*, *Right*. Sets the preferred flank for moving the ball forward.

inPossession.name: Patience
inPossession.description: Options: *Work Ball Into Box*, *Balanced*, *Less Often*. Governs how patiently the team works the ball in the final third.

inPossession.name: Shots from Distance
inPossession.description: Options: *Reduced*, *Balanced*, *Encouraged*. Adjusts the frequency of long-range shots.

inPossession.name: Crossing Style
inPossession.description: Options: *Low Crosses*, *Balanced*, *High Crosses*. Chooses the type of crosses delivered into the box.

outOfPossession.name: Line of Engagement
outOfPossession.description: Options: *High Press*, *Mid Block*, *Low Block*. Determines where on the pitch pressing begins.

outOfPossession.name: Defensive Line
outOfPossession.description: Options: *Deeper*, *Standard*, *Higher*, *Much Higher*. Sets how high the defensive line holds.

outOfPossession.name: Defensive Line Behaviour
outOfPossession.description: Options: *Balanced*, *Offside Trap*, *Step Up*. Controls how defenders respond to attacking runs.

outOfPossession.name: Trigger Press
outOfPossession.description: Options: *Less Often*, *Balanced*, *More Often*. Determines how frequently players close down opponents.

outOfPossession.name: Defensive Transition
outOfPossession.description: Options: *Counter-Press*, *Standard*, *Regroup*. Sets the team's approach immediately after losing possession.

outOfPossession.name: Pressing Trap
outOfPossession.description: Options: *Balanced*, *Active*. Configures whether the team sets coordinated pressing traps.

outOfPossession.name: Short Goalkeeper Distribution
outOfPossession.description: Options: *Yes*, *No*. Specifies whether forwards press opposing goalkeepers to force long kicks.

outOfPossession.name: Cross Engagement
outOfPossession.description: Options: *Hold Position*, *Balanced*, *Contest*. Controls how defenders deal with crosses.

goalkeeper.name: Goalkeeper
goalkeeper.description: Balanced role; distributes according to team strategy.

goalkeeper.name: Line-Holding Keeper
goalkeeper.description: New; remains in the box, avoiding sweeper actions.

goalkeeper.name: No-Nonsense Goalkeeper
goalkeeper.description: New; safety-first distribution and risk-averse play.

goalkeeper.name: Sweeper Keeper
goalkeeper.description: Intercepts balls outside the box; proactive in defence.

goalkeeper.name: Ball-Playing Goalkeeper
goalkeeper.description: Joins the build-up phase like an outfield player.

centre_back.name: Centre-Back
centre_back.description: Balanced defender who assists in regaining possession.

centre_back.name: No-Nonsense CB
centre_back.description: Clears danger and avoids risky passes.

centre_back.name: Covering CB
centre_back.description: Holds the defensive line and reacts to attackers.

centre_back.name: Stopping CB
centre_back.description: Steps out aggressively to challenge attackers early.

centre_back.name: Ball-Playing CB
centre_back.description: Plays line-breaking passes and dribbles forward.

centre_back.name: Overlapping CB
centre_back.description: Moves into wide areas to support attacks.

centre_back.name: Advanced CB
centre_back.description: New; transitions into a defensive-midfield role during build-up.

centre_back.name: Wide CB
centre_back.description: and Covering/Stopping variations. Provides width and recycling options.

full_back.name: Inside Full-Back
full_back.description: New; tucks behind centre-backs for build-up.

full_back.name: Inverted Full-Back
full_back.description: Moves into midfield to create overloads.

full_back.name: Pressing Full-Back
full_back.description: New; supports high press and operates like a defensive winger.

wing_back.name: Wing-Back
wing_back.description: Combines full-back and winger duties; overlaps and supports attacks.

wing_back.name: Holding Wing-Back
wing_back.description: New; stays deeper during pressing phases.

wing_back.name: Inside Wing-Back
wing_back.description: New; shuttles inside to support central build-up.

wing_back.name: Inverted Wing-Back
wing_back.description: Plays like a defensive midfielder, moving centrally.

wing_back.name: Pressing Wing-Back
wing_back.description: New; presses opponents high up the pitch.

wing_back.name: Playmaking Wing-Back
wing_back.description: New; acts as a central hub of passing, creating chances from deep.

wing_back.name: Advanced Wing-Back
wing_back.description: New; stays high and wide, similar to a wide midfielder.

defensive_midfield.name: Dropping DM
defensive_midfield.description: New; drops into the backline when under pressure.

defensive_midfield.name: Screening DM
defensive_midfield.description: New; holds central zones to cut off passing lanes.

defensive_midfield.name: Wide Covering DM
defensive_midfield.description: New; shifts wide to help full-backs.

defensive_midfield.name: Pressing DM
defensive_midfield.description: New; steps forward aggressively to press.

defensive_midfield.name: Deep-Lying Playmaker
defensive_midfield.description: Sits deep and initiates attacks with precise passes.

central_midfield.name: Central Midfielder
central_midfield.description: Balanced role supporting defence and attack.

central_midfield.name: Screening CM
central_midfield.description: New; holds the central zone defensively.

central_midfield.name: Wide Covering CM
central_midfield.description: New; shifts wide to cover flanks.

central_midfield.name: Box-to-Box Midfielder
central_midfield.description: Covers the entire pitch, contributing in both boxes.

central_midfield.name: Box-to-Box Playmaker
central_midfield.description: New; creative variant of the B2B midfielder.

central_midfield.name: Channel Midfielder
central_midfield.description: New; makes under-lapping runs into wide channels.

central_midfield.name: Midfield Playmaker
central_midfield.description: New; creative link who may move into attacking midfield.

central_midfield.name: Pressing CM
central_midfield.description: New; steps up to press opponents high.

wide_midfield.name: Wide Midfielder
wide_midfield.description: Plays deeper and delivers crosses from wide areas.

wide_midfield.name: Wide Central Midfielder
wide_midfield.description: New; operates wide within a midfield trio.

wide_midfield.name: Wide Outlet Midfielder
wide_midfield.description: New; stays high to provide an outlet without defensive duties.

attacking_midfield.name: Attacking Midfielder
attacking_midfield.description: Operates between the lines to create space.

attacking_midfield.name: Tracking AM
attacking_midfield.description: New; drops deep to help defend.

attacking_midfield.name: Advanced Playmaker
attacking_midfield.description: Creates chances in advanced central areas.

attacking_midfield.name: Central Outlet AM
attacking_midfield.description: New; remains high, avoiding defensive work.

attacking_midfield.name: Splitting Outlet AM
attacking_midfield.description: New; stays high and drifts wide to aid counters.

attacking_midfield.name: Free Role
attacking_midfield.description: New; roams creatively across the attacking third.

winger.name: Winger
winger.description: Stretches play on the flank and delivers crosses.

winger.name: Inside Winger
winger.description: New; similar to half-space winger but with slightly different movement patterns.

winger.name: Inverting Outlet Winger
winger.description: New; stays high and moves inside to support counters.

winger.name: Tracking Winger
winger.description: New; drops deep to provide defensive cover.

winger.name: Wide Outlet Winger
winger.description: New; stays high and wide, avoiding defensive duties.

winger.name: Wide Playmaker
winger.description: New; starts wide and drifts inside to create chances.

winger.name: Wide Forward
winger.description: New; wide attacker who makes runs into the box.

winger.name: Inside Forward
winger.description: Moves inside from the wing to attack central spaces.

striker.name: False Nine
striker.description: Drops deep to create space and play-make.

striker.name: Deep-Lying Forward
striker.description: Links midfield and attack, distributing play.

striker.name: Half-Space Forward
striker.description: New; wide attacker who cuts inside into channels.

striker.name: Second Striker
striker.description: New; drops deep early and then runs forward to score.

striker.name: Channel Forward
striker.description: New; runs into wide channels, stretching defences.

striker.name: Centre Forward
striker.description: Classic number 9 who leads the line.

striker.name: Central Outlet CF
striker.description: New; stays high and central, contributing little defensively.

striker.name: Splitting Outlet CF
striker.description: New; stays high and drifts wide to aid counter-attacks.

striker.name: Tracking CF
striker.description: New; drops deep to help defend.

striker.name: Target Forward
striker.description: Provides a physical presence and aerial threat.

striker.name: Poacher
striker.description: Stays central and looks to finish chances.

duties.name: Attack
duties.description: Players on an Attack duty make aggressive forward runs, take risks and prioritise scoring or creating goals. This is the highest-risk duty.

duties.name: Support
duties.description: Balances attacking and defensive responsibilities; players contribute to building attacks while retaining positional discipline.

duties.name: Defend
duties.description: Players hold position, maintain shape and focus on stopping opponents. Suitable for maintaining solidity.

duties.name: Stopper
duties.description: Centre-back-only duty; the defender steps out of the line to engage attackers aggressively, attempting to win the ball early.

duties.name: Cover
duties.description: Another centre-back-only duty; the defender stays deeper to sweep up behind the defensive line.

duties.name: Automatic
duties.description: Duty that changes based on team mentality: acts like Attack in attacking mentalities and like Defend in defensive ones.
